title: Language Translator
description: Developed a web-based application that translates text from one language to another, facilitating communication across different languages by providing accurate and fast translations.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Provides live weather updates including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and precipitation.

title: StayFinder- Hotel Booking web
description: A hotel booking web application with real-time availability, property listings, secure payments, and responsive design. Integrated APIs for live hotel data and optimized performance across all devices.
